mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPLAINT_MAIN( complaint_main_id, case_number, patient_name, patient_sex, patient_age, patient_card, patient_mobile, involve_hospital, hospital_level, hospital_grade, involve_department, involve_employee, proc_ins_id, create_date, update_date, del_flag, source ) VALUES ( #{complaintMainId}, #{caseNumber}, #{patientName}, #{patientSex}, #{patientAge}, #{patientCard}, #{patientMobile}, #{involveHospital}, #{hospitalLevel}, #{hospitalGrade}, #{involveDepartment}, #{involveEmployee}, #{procInsid}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, 0, #{source} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.ACT_NAME_ AS actName, b.complaint_main_id AS complaintMainId, b.case_number AS caseNumber, b.create_date AS reportingTime, d.name, d.photo,a.visitor_name AS visitorName, f.name AS hospitalName FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN b ON b.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT y.proc_inst_id_,y.act_name_ FROM (select z.* from ACT_HI_ACTINST z order by z.start_time_ desc) y WHERE y.act_type_='userTask' group by y.proc_inst_id_ order by y.start_time_ desc) c ON c.PROC_INST_ID_=b.PROC_INS_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER d ON d.id=a.next_link_man LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHATUSER e ON e.sys_user_id=d.id LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE f ON f.id=b.involve_hospital WHERE e.wechat_user_id=#{wechatUserId} AND c.act_name_='报案登记'

SELECT c.ACT_NAME_ AS actName, b.complaint_main_id AS complaintMainId, b.case_number AS caseNumber, b.create_date AS reportingTime, d.name, d.photo, a.visitor_name AS visitorName, f.name AS hospitalName FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN b ON b.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT y.proc_inst_id_,y.act_name_ FROM (select z.* from ACT_HI_ACTINST z order by z.start_time_ desc) y WHERE y.act_type_='userTask' group by y.proc_inst_id_ order by y.start_time_ desc) c ON c.PROC_INST_ID_=b.PROC_INS_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER d ON d.id=a.next_link_man LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHATUSER e ON e.sys_user_id=d.id LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE f ON f.id=b.involve_hospital WHERE b.involve_hospital = (SELECT SYS_USER.office_id FROM SYS_USER LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHATUSER ON CMS_WECHATUSER.sys_user_id=SYS_USER.id WHERE CMS_WECHATUSER.wechat_user_id=#{wechatUserId}) AND c.act_name_='报案登记'

SELECT COMPLAINT_MAIN.patient_sex AS patientSex,COMPLAINT_MAIN.patient_age AS patientAge,COMPLAINT_MAIN.involve_hospital AS involveHospital,COMPLAINT_MAIN.case_number AS caseNumber,COMPLAINT_INFO.visitor_date AS visitorDate,COMPLAINT_INFO.complaint_mode AS complaintMode,COMPLAINT_INFO.visitor_name AS visitorName,COMPLAINT_INFO.visitor_mobile AS visitorMobile,COMPLAINT_INFO.visitor_number AS visitorNumber,COMPLAINT_INFO.patient_relation AS patientRelation,COMPLAINT_INFO.summary_of_disputes AS summaryOfDisputes,COMPLAINT_INFO.appeal,COMPLAINT_INFO.reception_employee AS receptionEmployee,COMPLAINT_INFO.reception_date AS receptionDate,COMPLAINT_INFO.next_link_man AS nextLinkMan,COMPLAINT_INFO.patient_name AS patientName,COMPLAINT_INFO.status FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_INFO ON COMPLAINT_INFO.complaint_main_id=COMPLAINT_MAIN.complaint_main_id WHERE COMPLAINT_MAIN.complaint_main_id=#{complaintMainId}
SELECT MAX(case_number) FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN WHERE del_flag=0 AND case_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{nowDate},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE COMPLAINT_MAIN SET proc_ins_id=#{procInsId} WHERE COMPLAINT_MAIN_ID=#{complaintMainId}
mapper.select: SELECT ACT_HI_ACTINST.act_name_ FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN LEFT JOIN act_hi_actinst ON ACT_HI_ACTINST.proc_inst_id_=COMPLAINT_MAIN.proc_ins_id WHERE COMPLAINT_MAIN_ID=#{complaintMainId} AND ACT_HI_ACTINST.act_type_='userTask' ORDER BY ACT_HI_ACTINST.start_time_ DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT COMPLAINT_MAIN.patient_name AS patientName,COMPLAINT_MAIN.case_number AS caseNumber,COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL.visitor_name AS visitorName,COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL.patient_relation AS patientRelation,COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL.visitor_mobile AS visitorMobile,COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL.summary_of_disputes AS summaryOfDisputes,COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL.appeal,SYS_OFFICE.name AS involveHospital FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL ON COMPLAINT_MAIN.complaint_main_id=COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE ON COMPLAINT_MAIN.involve_hospital=SYS_OFFICE.id WHERE COMPLAINT_MAIN.complaint_main_id=#{complaintMainId}

SELECT ACT_HI_ACTINST.act_name_ AS actName,ACT_HI_ACTINST.start_time_ AS startTime FROM ACT_HI_ACTINST LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN ON COMPLAINT_MAIN.proc_ins_id=ACT_HI_ACTINST.proc_inst_id_ WHERE COMPLAINT_MAIN.complaint_main_id=#{complaintMainId} AND ACT_HI_ACTINST.act_type_='userTask'

SELECT SYS_USER.id FROM SYS_USER LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_ROLE ON SYS_USER.id=SYS_USER_ROLE.user_id LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE ON SYS_USER.office_id =SYS_OFFICE.id WHERE SYS_USER_ROLE.role_id=(SELECT id FROM SYS_ROLE WHERE enname='distribution') AND SYS_OFFICE.area_id=#{areaId} LIMIT 1

SELECT COMPLAINT_INFO.complaint_id AS complaintId, COMPLAINT_INFO.visitor_name AS visitorName, COMPLAINT_INFO.create_date AS createDate, COMPLAINT_INFO.summary_of_disputes AS summaryOfDisputes, COMPLAINT_INFO.handle_way AS handleWay, ifnull(COMPLAINT_INFO.handle_result,"") AS handleResult, COMPLAINT_INFO.RECEPTION_DATE AS receptionDate, ifnull(SYS_USER.name,'') AS name FROM COMPLAINT_INFO LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHAT_COMPLAINT ON COMPLAINT_INFO.complaint_main_id=CMS_WECHAT_COMPLAINT.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN SYS_USER ON SYS_USER.id = COMPLAINT_INFO.UPDATE_BY WHERE CMS_WECHAT_COMPLAINT.wechat_user_id=#{wechatUserId}

SELECT ifnull(c.ACT_NAME_,'') AS actName, b.complaint_main_id AS complaintMainId, b.case_number AS caseNumber, b.create_date AS reportingTime, a.visitor_date AS visitorDate, e.name, e.photo, a.visitor_name AS visitorName, f.name AS hospitalName, ifnull(h.userstatu,'') AS userStatu FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN b ON b.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT proc_inst_id_,act_name_ FROM ACT_HI_ACTINST WHERE act_type_='userTask' group by proc_inst_id_,act_name_ order by start_time_ desc) c ON c.PROC_INST_ID_=b.PROC_INS_ID LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHAT_COMPLAINT d ON d.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_INFO g ON g.COMPLAINT_MAIN_ID=a.COMPLAINT_MAIN_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER e ON e.id=g.next_link_man LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHATUSER h on h.SYS_USER_ID=e.id LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE f ON f.id=b.involve_hospital WHERE d.wechat_user_id=#{wechatUserId} group by b.complaint_main_id

SELECT COMPLAINT_INFO.complaint_id AS complaintId, COMPLAINT_INFO.visitor_name AS visitorName, COMPLAINT_INFO.create_date AS createDate, COMPLAINT_INFO.summary_of_disputes AS summaryOfDisputes, COMPLAINT_INFO.handle_way AS handleWay, ifnull(COMPLAINT_INFO.handle_result,"") AS handleResult, COMPLAINT_INFO.RECEPTION_DATE AS receptionDate, ifnull(SYS_USER.`NAME`,'') AS name FROM COMPLAINT_INFO LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHAT_COMPLAINT ON COMPLAINT_INFO.complaint_main_id=CMS_WECHAT_COMPLAINT.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN SYS_USER ON SYS_USER.id = COMPLAINT_INFO.UPDATE_BY WHERE COMPLAINT_INFO.involve_hospital = (SELECT SYS_USER.office_id FROM SYS_USER LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHATUSER ON CMS_WECHATUSER.sys_user_id=SYS_USER.id WHERE CMS_WECHATUSER.wechat_user_id=#{wechatUserId})
SELECT a.name,a.photo FROM SYS_USER a LEFT JOIN ${tableName} b ON b.next_link_man=a.id WHERE b.complaint_main_id=${complaintMainId}

SELECT a.complaint_main_id AS complaintMainId, f.visitor_name AS visitorName, c.case_number AS caseNumber, a.reporting_time AS reportingTime, b.name, b.photo, d.ACT_NAME_ AS actName, g.name AS hospitalName FROM MACHINE_ACCOUNT a LEFT JOIN SYS_USER b ON a.mediator_id=b.id LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN c ON c.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT y.proc_inst_id_,y.act_name_ FROM (select z.* from ACT_HI_ACTINST z order by z.start_time_ desc ) y WHERE y.act_type_='userTask' group by y.proc_inst_id_ order by y.start_time_ desc) d ON d.PROC_INST_ID_=c.PROC_INS_ID LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHATUSER e ON e.sys_user_id=a.MEDIATOR_ID LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL f ON f.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE g ON g.id=a.hospital_id WHERE e.wechat_user_id=#{wechatUserId}

SELECT c.ACT_NAME_ AS actName, b.complaint_main_id AS complaintMainId, b.case_number AS caseNumber, b.create_date AS reportingTime, a.visitor_date AS visitorDate, d.name, d.photo,a.visitor_name AS visitorName, f.name AS hospitalName FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN b ON b.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT proc_inst_id_,act_name_ FROM ACT_HI_ACTINST WHERE act_type_='userTask' group by proc_inst_id_,act_name_ order by start_time_ desc) c ON c.PROC_INST_ID_=b.PROC_INS_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER d ON d.id=a.next_link_man LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHATUSER e ON e.sys_user_id=d.id LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE f ON f.id=b.involve_hospital WHERE e.wechat_user_id=#{wechatUserId} group by b.complaint_main_id

SELECT c.ACT_NAME_ AS actName, b.complaint_main_id AS complaintMainId, b.case_number AS caseNumber, b.create_date AS reportingTime, a.visitor_date AS visitorDate, d.name, d.photo, a.visitor_name AS visitorName, f.name AS hospitalName FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN b ON b.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT y.proc_inst_id_,y.act_name_ FROM (select z.* from ACT_HI_ACTINST z order by z.start_time_ desc) y WHERE y.act_type_='userTask' group by y.proc_inst_id_ order by y.start_time_ desc) c ON c.PROC_INST_ID_=b.PROC_INS_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER d ON d.id=a.next_link_man LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHATUSER e ON e.sys_user_id=d.id LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE f ON f.id=b.involve_hospital WHERE b.involve_hospital = (SELECT SYS_USER.office_id FROM SYS_USER LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHATUSER ON CMS_WECHATUSER.sys_user_id=SYS_USER.id WHERE CMS_WECHATUSER.wechat_user_id=#{wechatUserId}) group by b.complaint_main_id
